Actions.Name: Create a story
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new story.

Actions.Name: Get a story
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves all information about a story, given its id.

Actions.Name: List projects
Actions.Description: List all projects for the current user.

Actions.Name: When a story is completed
Actions.Description: Triggers when an existing story is completed in the given project.

Actions.Name: When a new story is created
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new story is added to the given project.

Actions.Name: When a story is updated
Actions.Description: Triggers when a story is created or the details of an existing story are updated in the given project.

Actions.Name: Update a story
Actions.Description: This operation is used to update the details of a story, given its id.
